overview: Do you get shaky if you haven't squeezed a big tit in the last six hours? Do you practice motorboating between two pillows when you can't get a date? Then there's no question - you're a Big Boob Addict! Luckily 3rd Degree has the cure for your unrequited funbag fantasies! A 2-disc compilation of heavenly hooters and divine D-cups-plus that will have you suckling at the nipples of the most beautiful well-endowed babes to grace our stages. Every scene is handpicked for its breastacular bonanza of big boobs, so you know you won't be disappointed!
title: Big Boob Addicts
